document.forum_title: KCTV Kansas City - Most Popular Stories
document.discussion_title: Police ID man shot, killed outside Kansas City bar
document.topic_text: KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - A 42-year-old Kansas City man has died after a shooting at a bar. The victim has been identified as Derrick Wren. Police were called just before 8 p.m. Saturday to East 57th Street and Troost Avenue and found Wren with apparent gunshot wounds. He was then taken to an area hospital where he died from his injuries. No arrests have been made. Copyright 2016 KCTV (Meredith Corp.)
